about_the_game:
"Biochemical Lost City" is a cartoon-style shooting survival chicken-eating game with a variety of game modes, giving you a different shooting experience, live online duel, you will come to a battle if you are not satisfied, show your real shooting skills, interested players Come download and try it out!

Game details
Biochemical Lost City is a cartoon-style action shooting chicken-eating game. The game uses superb 2.5D game graphics, with unique game graphics, novel eating chicken-eating gameplay, huge game map, and high degree of freedom. The world, a variety of gun combinations and gorgeous combos, give you a different way of eating chicken. If you like it, go and download it!

Game Features
1. Hundreds of people fight the strongest, and live to the end to be the ultimate winner;

2. Dozens of skills are freely matched, and the individual gameplay is the strongest in the history;

3. Single and double row mode, the man who is the strongest king;

4. The future science and technology machine war mode, the first machine warfare gameplay;

5. Featured 1V1 decisive battle mode, solo is not accepted.

Game highlights
1. The zombie challenge, the hope of the doomsday age;

2. Move the joystick to automatically aim and shoot;

3. Fight with your own robot;

4. Upgrade weapons to strengthen more attributes.

Game advantage

1. Sliding screen to change guns, unlimited firepower will take you to fly;

2. Exciting activities, the biochemical frenzy is coming;

3. Rich firearms, fierce battle of life and death;

4. Alien battle pet, superb experience of mecha fit.

name: 生化迷城

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Card (DirectX 10 capabilities)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required

short_description: Biochemical Lost City is a "zombie" theme mobile game that combines gunfight shooting + RPG gameplay. This game perfectly integrates role-playing and shooting themes, not only keeps firepower during fierce battles, but also makes your operating experience more exciting.
